library

Class LibraryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • library.LibraryController

  • public class LibraryController
extends java.lang.Object
    this is the "main" controller for the whole program. Here is pretty much every logic and instance for the program to start and load the users and the media.
    Author:
    Tom Leonardsson

      void loadMedia(java.lang.String path)
      this method is just like the one that load all the user, but its for media.
      void loadUsers(java.lang.String path)
      This method is for loading the users to the database. first of all it as a parameter 'path'. this is the source file where all users are. it then create a new BinarySearchTree. after that it get the first value of a user, and then goes into a loop for gathering all the users in the file. for every information in get, it create a new user object.
      void setLogInController(LogInController logInController)
      this is a set-method for instancing the logInCtroller.

      a set-method for changing the view if needed.

      • loadUsers

        public void loadUsers(java.lang.String path)
        This method is for loading the users to the database. first of all it as a parameter 'path'. this is the source file where all users are. it then create a new BinarySearchTree. after that it get the first value of a user, and then goes into a loop for gathering all the users in the file. for every information in get, it create a new user object. It keeps running till all users are gathered. there is an IOException, if it couldnt find any user in the file.
        Parameters:
        path -

      • getAmountOfMedia

        public int getAmountOfMedia(java.lang.String path)
        this method is for counting how many media there are, and after that it return the amount of media . there is an IOException if it couldnt find any media.
        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        return the amount of media there are.

      • loadMedia

        public void loadMedia(java.lang.String path)
        this method is just like the one that load all the user, but its for media. The difference is that is gets how many media there are in the source file. And here it divide the media into two part, namely dvd and book. it creates an object for each one.
        Parameters:
        path -
